item.title: Crowdsourcing and Crowdfunding
item.description: Crowdsourcing is … Coined from the term crowd and outsourcing, means that the group or the masses have a very uniqe influence in processes that gets the work done. Since the advent of the internet connecting people all round the world it is easier to communicate, co-operate and support. Crowdsourcing is benefitial because iy greatly increases scalability, fills knowledge gaps, accelerates the processes, reduces operational costs and increases customer engagement.
